title: Romance Guide
content:
e and add Wyll back into the party then head to the Goblin Camp. Look for Spike and speak about Mizora, players will need to kill Spike and Abdirak when he says that Mizora is no longer there.

End the day here and speak with Wyll back at the campsite, Wyll will then open up about Mizora. Go to bed after this conversation. Head back to the Goblin Camp and speak with Halsin in their prison, hunt down all of the Goblin leaders while Wyll is still in your party. This gives the option of Romancing W
